## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                         | Description                                                 |
| ---------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--card-`                    |                                                             |
| `--card-background-color`    | card background-color <br> Default: rgb(255, 255, 255)      |
| `--card-body-padding`        | card-body padding <br> Default: 1.25rem                     |
| `--card-border`              | card border <br> Default: 1px                               |
| `--card-border-color`        | card border-color <br> Default: rgba(0, 0, 0, .125)         |
| `--card-border-radius`       | card border-radius <br> Default: .25rem                     |
| `--card-style`               | card style <br> Default: solid                              |
| `--card-title-font-size`     | card-title-font-size font-size <br> 1.25rem                 |
| `--card-title-font-weight`   | card-title-font-weight font-weight <br> 500                 |
| `--card-title-line-height`   | card-title-line-height line-height <br> 1.2                 |
| `--card-title-margin-bottom` | card-title-margin-bottom margin-bottom <br> Default: .75rem |
| `--card-width`               | card width <br> Default: 18rem                              |
